author: AWR Hawkins
title: NRA, Second Amendment Foundation Sue California Governor over Gun Store Closures
description: The NRA, Second Amendment Foundation, California Gun Rights Coalition, and Firearms Policy Conference filed a suit Friday against California Governor Gavin Newsom (D), pointing to gun store closures to claim state and local policies and enforcement measures a…
